definition: Taiwan pr. used in 夾生|夹生[jia1 sheng1] and 夾竹桃|夹竹桃[jia1 zhu2 tao2]
to press from either side/to place in between/to sandwich/to carry sth under armpit/wedged between/between/to intersperse/to mix/to mingle/clip/folder/Taiwan pr. [jia2]
to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control

sentences.english: Air pressure opens the gripper and a spring is used to close the gripper.
sentences.chinese: 氣壓打開夾持器，彈簧關閉夾持器。

sentences.english: Air pressure opens the gripper and a spring is used to close the gripper.
sentences.chinese: 氣壓打開夾持器，彈簧關閉夾持器。

sentences.english: If the workpiece is of simple construction, the jig may be clamped on the workpiece.
sentences.chinese: 如果工件結構比較簡單，鑽模可夾持在工件上。

sentences.english: It's clamp size can be adjust with the aim of holding each size of embedding block.
sentences.chinese: 其夾口大小可調整，以便夾持各種大小的包埋塊。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a screwdriver with a clamper.
sentences.chinese: 一種帶夾持器的螺絲刀。

sentences.english: The utility model can clamp various angling rods, and the utility model is suitable for land and sea.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型可夾持各種漁杆，適於陸海兩用。

sentences.english: Sturdily mount the clamping device of machine.
sentences.chinese: 研磨機夾持必須安裝牢固。

sentences.english: Cutting small slits in the grip tape will help it to fit on the skateboard.
sentences.chinese: 切割開衩的夾持帶小，以適應將幫助它在滑板。

sentences.english: Flat nose clamp is used to grip parts.
sentences.chinese: 平口鉗是用來夾持工件進行加工用的部件。

sentences.english: Front beam can be adjusted for glass of different thickness.
sentences.chinese: 前梁可調以夾持不同厚度的玻璃。

sentences.english: A clamp is placed over my nose so I can breathe only through my mouth.
sentences.chinese: 一個夾子夾持住我的鼻子，所以我只能用嘴來呼吸。

sentences.english: Assists one-handed dressing by passing through button hole and gripping thread of button.
sentences.chinese: 助攻單手穿衣透過按鈕孔與按鍵夾持螺紋合格。

sentences.english: Work-holding devices are called jigs and fixtures.
sentences.chinese: 工件夾持裝置叫做鑽模或夾具。

sentences.english: The hydraulic clamping to bed has variable hydraulic pressure to tailstock quill.
sentences.chinese: 油壓夾持底座已經變壓力於尾座尖端。

sentences.english: Clamp machine of billet material is used at the working procedure of stock heat up stove.
sentences.chinese: 鋼坯夾持機是用於型鋼廠加熱爐的備料工序。

sentences.english: It is an accessory connecting the cutting torch and the flame cutting machine.
sentences.chinese: 機用朝炬夾持靜是建接機用割炬與火焰切村機的附件。
